message:
Pain during periods is common, nothing to worry about..

Please help me understand, when does the pain/cramps in the stomach start?
With the starting of the periods
other_symptoms: Pain starts with starting of periods

message: One day before the period starts
other_symptoms: Pain starts one day before the periods

message:
Thank you..

And how long does the pain last?
Pain stays throughout my period cycle or remains for first 1-2 days.
other_symptoms: Pain stays throughout your period cycle or remains for first 1-2 days.

message:
I get that..

Is the pain accompanied by any of the following?
Pain starts 3-5 days before the period starts
other_symptoms: Pain starts 3-5 days before the period starts

message:
I get that..

Does pain stops with the starting of the period?

other_symptoms: Pain stops with starting of the period

message: Is the pain accompanied by any of the following

Ok..

Can you tell me, how severe is the pain?
I can do daily activities but with little difficulty
other_symptoms: Little difficulty in doing daily activities

diagnosis: You seem to be absolutely fine, no need to worry!
general_advice: Rest and relax|Keep yourself hydrated|Gentle massage to abdominal and lower back|Do gentle exercise to improve flow of blood to pelvic area

message: I can not do daily activities at all

diagnosis: You are at a moderate risk of primary dysmenorrhoea
general_advice: Rest and relax|Keep yourself hydrated|Gentle massage to abdominal and lower back|Do gentle exercise to improve flow of blood to pelvic area
